remarks: Subset law for projective subspace sum valid for all subsets of atoms. (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2012.)
statement:
paddssw.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddssw.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddssw2 $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) C_ Z -> ( X C_ Z /\ Y C_ Z ) ) ) $.
